name: Ghouls Pool Party - The Chosen One

metadata.name: 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐂𝐡𝐨𝐬𝐞𝐧 𝐎𝐧𝐞 #1/54
metadata.description:
The ghouls pool party is the perfect place to let loose.

Whether it's the top of a skyscraper, or an abandoned building, or even in the middle of a desert, the ghouls pool party will be happening somewhere. It's a chance for you to dance your cares away and forget about everything for just one night. The music is loud and the glow of neon lights is dazzling.

It's time to dance when all hopes are gone. The ghouls pool party starts now.
